data.title: Oracle ADF consultant Resume Winston
data.meta_description: Experience of 8.8 years in IT industry, across the analysis, design and development phases of the software development life cycle, on Oracle ADF, Angular, Java and web based applications.Oracle Fusion Middleware (Oracle ADF 11g, Oracle SOA Suite 11g) developer.Strong experience in developing web applications in eclipse IDE using J2EE concepts like Spring, Hibernate, JSF, Servlets, JSP, MVC architecture, JDBC.Strong experience in Oracle Fusion Middleware (Oracle ADF 11g, Oracle SOA Suite 11g).Exp
data.text:
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:

Experience of 8.8 years in IT industry, across the analysis, design and development phases of the software development life cycle, on Oracle ADF, Angular, Java and web based applications.

Oracle Fusion Middleware (Oracle ADF 11g, Oracle SOA Suite 11g) developer.

Strong experience in developing web applications in eclipse IDE using J2EE concepts like Spring, Hibernate, JSF, Servlets, JSP, MVC architecture, JDBC.

Strong experience in Oracle Fusion Middleware (Oracle ADF 11g, Oracle SOA Suite 11g).

Experience in gathering requirements, system analysis, design, development, testing and deploying of windows/web applications, Databases and GUI on Windows/Linux platform.

Experience in versioning tools like Perforce, Tortoise SVN, IBM Rational ClearCase and Oracle ADE.

Experience in application servers like Weblogic, WebSphere

Experience with JUnit for performing Unit Testing and determining the application functionality, and good working knowledge of ANT for project build scripts and Log4J for logging.

Proficient in Microsoft tools MS Word, MS Excel and PowerPoint.

Sound Knowledge in SQL, PL/SQL, and Database Design to write Stored Procedures, Functions and Triggers.

Good knowledge on LDAP.

Good knowledge on Angular4, JavaScript, JQuery.

Good knowledge on SOAP and REST web services.

Good knowledge on Email Protocols like IMAP, POP3, EXHANGE and DOMINO.

Good knowledge on IBM Tivoli Identity Manager, Tivoli Directory Server, Tivoli Directory Integrator products.

Good knowledge on Oracle Fusion - SCM - PIM (Product Information Management) product.

Good Knowledge in working on SCM, Identity Management & Mobile Domains.

Strong in both frond-end and back-end development.

Worked under Scrum Agile Methodology approach.

TECHNICAL SKILLS:

Operating Systems: Windows (98/2000/XP/7), Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server 5.3.

Technologies/Frameworks: Oracle Fusion Middleware 11g, Oracle ADF, Angular 4, Java, Spring, Hibernate, JDBC, JSF, JSP, Servlets, EJB, Oracle SOA SUITE 11g, SOAP, RESTful web services, JavaScript, JQuery, IBM Tivoli Identity Manager, Tivoli Directory Server, BPEL, LDAP, WSDL, XSLT, XML, JSON

Databases: Oracle 11g/10g/9 and SQL

Development Tools: Eclipse, JDeveloper

Web/Application Servers: Weblogic Application server 11, Tomcat 5.5, Web Sphere 6.1.

EXPERIENCE:

Confidential, Winston-Salem, NC

Oracle ADF consultant

Languages/Technologies/Frameworks Used: Oracle Fusion Middleware - Oracle ADF, Angular 4, JSF, JSP, Jdeveloper, Web services, Weblogic server, WSDL, XSLT, XML, JSON, Spring, Hibernate, EJB, Ant scripts, Soap UI, JavaScript, Jquery.

Responsibilities:

As a ADF Developer for Horizontal Confidential and Employee Sales Orders (ESO) applications, responsible for:

Analysis of product functionality.

Developing Rest Web service for preparing Confidential Catalog XML from GOC and GDO Xmls.

Developing Rest Web Services for all ESO operations using Spring and Hibernate.

Developing ESO UI using Angular 4.

Developed the new redesign UI based on Confidential Catalog XML.

Reduced the bandwidth consumption by using images and Catalog XML from cache.

Development, enhancements and bug fixes in the application.

Involved in Integration Testing during various phases of release.

Involved in coding PL/SQL scripts.

Confidential, Orrville, Ohio

Oracle ADF/Web services Developer

Languages/Technologies/Frameworks/Tools Used: Oracle Fusion Middleware - Oracle ADF UI, JSP, JSF, Java, ADF BC, JDeveloper, EJB, Web Services, Weblogic server, JSON, XML, PL/SQL scripts, Tortoise SVN, SOAP UI and SQL Developer, CVS, JavaScript, JQuery.

Responsibilities:

Develop Perpetual Inventory - Item Cycle Counts and Area Cycle Counts ADF screens.

Creating Java SOAP web services for different types of Movements creations. These Web services will be consumed by MARS team.

Analysis of project functionality.

Involved in design changes from time to time.

Implementing ADF backend Entity Objects, View Objects and Application module, which is the model layer of the framework.

Implementing all the layers in the MVC architecture of the ADF framework

Implementing ADF Frontend using the ADF UI Components (Components extended from JSF components), Task Flows, Page Fragments, Page Templates in the UI.

Implementing new Business Logic in Java to in corporate new functional changes to the code and physical data model.

Involved in Unit Testing.

Involved in coding PL/SQL scripts.

Confidential, New Jersey

Developer

Languages/Technologies/Frameworks Used: Oracle Fusion Middleware - ADF UI, JSF, Jsp, Jspx, ADF BC, Java, Unix scripting, Linux, SOA 11g, LDAP, Jdeveloper, Web services, Weblogic server, XML, JSON, Junits, pl/sql scripts, JQuery, JavaScript.

Responsibilities:

Analysis of product functionality.

Involved in design changes from time to time.

Learnt and used Oracle Fusion Middleware technologies.

Implementing ADF backend Entity Objects, View Objects and Application module, which is the model layer of the framework.

Implementing all the layers in the MVC architecture of the ADF framework

Implementing ADF Frontend using the ADF UI Components (Components extended from JSF components), Task Flows, Page Fragments, Page Templating and Navigation in the UI.

Implementing new Business Logic in Java to in corporate new functional changes to the code and physical data model.

Developing ADF Business Components and implementing Advanced techniques i.e. Entity Objects including the Business analysis and implementation business validations, View Objects for display purposes and Application Modules for transactional management and business logic.

Creating ADF-BC webservices on Java methods and service data objects (SDO) on view objects using JDeveloper. Integrating current project to further products to achieve an end-to-end flow.

Development, enhancements and bug fixes in the application.

Involved in Unit and System Testing using JUnit.

Involved in coding pl/sql upgrade scripts for data migration.

Worked under Agile Scrum Methodology.

Attended daily Scrum meetings.

Confidential

Developer & Module-lead

Languages/Technologies/Frameworks Used: Oracle ADF, Java, SQL, Servlets, JDBC, Log4j, Eclipse, JSP, JavaScript, CVS, LDAP.

Responsibilities:

Migration of AMExâ€™s existing ITIM 4.6 java backend code to ITIM 5.1 using new APIs

Modifying the workflows to ITIM 5.1 compatible workflows.

Involved in day to day meetings with the client on functional and technical enhancements.

Prepared migration related functional and technical documents.

Involved in Unit and System Testing.

Involved in Integration Testing.

Documented the test cases related to Unit testing.

Confidential, RWC, CA

Developer

Languages/Technologies/Frameworks Used: Java, XML, Oracle 10g, Junits, Log4j, Eclipse, JSP, JavaScript, CVS.

Responsibilities:
